trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides a way of reading a forward-only stream of rows from a SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx x xxx xx xxxxxxx x xxxxxxx$xxxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxx x XXX Xxxxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value that indicates the depth of nesting for the current row.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The depth of nesting for the current row.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the number of columns in the current row.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

When not positioned in a valid recordset, 0; otherwise the number of columns in the current row.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ 0$ xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

There is no current connection to an instance of SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx xx XXX Xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the value of the specified column in its native format given the column ordinal.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The value of the specified column in its native format.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the value of the specified column in its native format given the column name.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The value of the specified column in its native format.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

No column with the specified name was found.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted by execution of the Transact-SQL statement.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx Xxxxxxxx$XXX xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted; 0 if no rows were affected or the statement failed; and -1 for SELECT statements.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx$ 0 xx xx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx$ xxx $0 xxx XXXXXX xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of fields that are not hidden.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the value of the specified column as a Boolean.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx x Xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the value of the specified column as a byte.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx x xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The value of the specified column as a byte.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx x xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads a stream of bytes from the specified column offset into the buffer an array starting at the given buffer offset.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The index within the field from which to begin the read operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The buffer into which to read the stream of bytes.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The index within the buffer where the write operation is to start.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxx $xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The maximum length to copy into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the value of the specified column as a single character.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx x xxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads a stream of characters from the specified column offset into the buffer as an array starting at the given buffer offset.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The index within the field from which to begin the read operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The buffer into which to read the stream of bytes.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The index within the buffer where the write operation is to start.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxx $xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The maximum length to copy into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a string representing the data type of the specified column.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zero-based ordinal position of the column to find.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The string representing the data type of the specified column.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the value of the specified column as a double-precision floating point number.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx x xxxxxx$xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The type of the value to be returned.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
See the remarks section for more information.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

\n

  • binary

  • image

  • varbinary

  • udt
